message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'de.simonsator.partyandfriends.api.party.PartyManager' import. Should be before 'org.bukkit.entity.Player'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'de.simonsator.partyandfriends.api.party.PlayerParty' import. Should be before 'org.bukkit.entity.Player'.
Abbreviation in name 'PAFSPartyHandlerImpl' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
